Jx.Field.Text

Extends: Jx.Field

This class represents a text input field.

Summary
Jx.Field.TextExtends: Jx.Field
Options
overTextan object holding options for mootools-more’s OverText class. 
templateThe template used to render this field
Functions
renderCreates a text input field.



Options



overText
an object holding options for mootools-more’s OverText class.  Leave it null to not enable it, make it an object to enable.



template
The template used to render this field



Functions



render
render: function ()
Creates a text input field.









Extends: Jx.Widget

Creates a text input field.
